properties.description: Load Data From Blob To Synapse SQL Pool

source:
%%pyspark
# Imporing the libraries
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import lit,col,sum,mean,regexp_replace,to_date,count,row_number,unix_timestamp,date_format,quarter,expr,weekofyear
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType,TimestampType
from pyspark.sql.window import Window

# Setting the flag to handle the date formats
spark.sql("set spark.sql.legacy.timeParserPolicy=LEGACY")

# Creating a spark session and connection to blob storage account
blob_account_name = "rawdevstorage"
blob_container_name = "output"
sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("cmdevsynapse-WorkspaceDefaultStorage")
spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)

# Define the path to the Delta table
delta_table_path = 'abfss://output@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Electricity_Measurement_pyspark_join'

# Read Delta table into a DataFrame
reference_table = spark.read.format("delta").load(delta_table_path)
# Show the contents of the DataFrame

# Reading the geo location %%file
geo_location = spark.read.csv("abfss://output@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/geo_postcode.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True)

# Displaying a geo location file
display(geo_location.limit(5))

# Creating a group by for dimensions
grouped_reference_table_markt_dimension = reference_table.groupBy("DM_Markt")
markt_dimension1 = grouped_reference_table_markt_dimension.agg(count("DM_Trekkingsdatum"))
grouped_reference_table_markt_dimension = reference_table.groupBy("AM_Markt")
markt_dimension2 = grouped_reference_table_markt_dimension.agg(count("AM_Trekkingsdatum"))
markt_dimension = markt_dimension1.union(markt_dimension2).distinct()

grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_1 = reference_table.groupBy("DM_Trekkingsdatum")
date_dimension_1 = grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_1.agg(count("DM_Trekkingsdatum"))
grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_1 = reference_table.groupBy("AM_Trekkingsdatum")
date_dimension_2 = grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_1.agg(count("AM_Trekkingsdatum"))
date_dimension_1 = date_dimension_1.union(date_dimension_2).distinct()

grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_2 = reference_table.groupBy("DM_Peildatum")
date_dimension_2 = grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_2.agg(count("DM_Trekkingsdatum"))
grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_2 = reference_table.groupBy("AM_Peildatum")
date_dimension_3 = grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_2.agg(count("AM_Trekkingsdatum"))
date_dimension_2 = date_dimension_2.union(date_dimension_3).distinct()

grouped_reference_table_geo_location_dimension = reference_table.groupBy("DM_Leveringsadres_Postcode","DM_Leveringsadres_Gemeente")
geo_location_dimension1 = grouped_reference_table_geo_location_dimension.agg(count("DM_Trekkingsdatum"))
grouped_reference_table_geo_location_dimension = reference_table.groupBy("AM_Leveringsadres_Postcode","AM_Leveringsadres_Gemeente")
geo_location_dimension2 = grouped_reference_table_geo_location_dimension.agg(count("AM_Trekkingsdatum"))
geo_location_dimension = geo_location_dimension1.union(geo_location_dimension2).distinct()

# Exclude the undefined/null value
markt_dimension = markt_dimension.filter(col("DM_Markt").isNotNull())

date_dimension_1 = date_dimension_1.filter(col("DM_Trekkingsdatum").isNotNull())
date_dimension_2 = date_dimension_2.filter(col("DM_Peildatum").isNotNull())
geo_location_dimension = geo_location_dimension.filter(col("DM_Leveringsadres_Postcode").isNotNull())
geo_location_dimension = geo_location_dimension.filter(col("DM_Leveringsadres_Gemeente").isNotNull())

# Rename columns
markt_dimension = markt_dimension.withColumnRenamed("DM_Markt", "Markt_Name") \
.withColumnRenamed("count(DM_Trekkingsdatum)", "count")

date_dimension_1 = date_dimension_1.withColumnRenamed("DM_Trekkingsdatum", "Date") \
.withColumnRenamed("count(DM_Trekkingsdatum)", "count")

date_dimension_2 = date_dimension_2.withColumnRenamed("DM_Peildatum", "Date") \
.withColumnRenamed("count(DM_Trekkingsdatum)", "count")

geo_location_dimension = geo_location_dimension.withColumnRenamed("DM_Leveringsadres_Postcode", "Leveringsadres_Postcode") \
.withColumnRenamed("DM_Leveringsadres_Gemeente", "Leveringsadres_Gemeente")\
.withColumnRenamed("count(DM_Trekkingsdatum)", "count")

# Selecting specific columns
markt_dimension = markt_dimension.select('Markt_Name').distinct().orderBy("Markt_Name")
date_dimension_1 = date_dimension_1.select("Date").distinct().orderBy("Date")
date_dimension_2 = date_dimension_2.select("Date").distinct().orderBy("Date")
geo_location_dimension = geo_location_dimension.select("Leveringsadres_Postcode","Leveringsadres_Gemeente").distinct().orderBy("Leveringsadres_Postcode")

# joinigng the dataframe to get all the column for geo location dimension
geo_location_dimension = geo_location.join(geo_location_dimension, geo_location["postcode"] == geo_location_dimension["Leveringsadres_Postcode"], "left")

# Unioning the date dimension and removing the duplicates
date_dimension = date_dimension_1.union(date_dimension_2).distinct().orderBy("Date")

# Define the window specification for the grouping
markt_dimension_window_spec = Window.orderBy(markt_dimension["Markt_Name"].desc()) #Window.partitionBy("DM_Markt").orderBy("DM_Markt")
date_dimension_window_spec = Window.orderBy(date_dimension["Date"].desc())

# Add an auto-incrementing column to the DataFrame within the group
markt_dimension = markt_dimension.withColumn("Markt_ID", row_number().over(markt_dimension_window_spec))
date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Date_ID", row_number().over(date_dimension_window_spec))

# Adding additional columns for the date_dimension_window_spec
date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Day", date_format(date_dimension["Date"], "d").cast("integer"))
date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Month", date_format(date_dimension["Date"], "M").cast("integer"))
date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Year", date_format(date_dimension["Date"], "y").cast("integer"))
date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Quarter", quarter(date_dimension["Date"]))
date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Day_Of_Year", expr("dayofyear(Date)"))
date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Week_Number", weekofyear(date_dimension["Date"]))

# Selecting specific columns and Rearranging the columns
markt_dimension = markt_dimension.select("Markt_ID", "Markt_Name")
date_dimension = date_dimension.select("Date_ID","Date","Day","Month","Year","Quarter","Day_Of_Year","Week_Number")
geo_location_dimension = geo_location_dimension.select('dwh_id', 'postcode', 'Leveringsadres_Postcode', 'Leveringsadres_Gemeente', 'hoofdgemeente',
'huidige_hoofdgemeente', 'gewest', 'huidig_gewest', 'provincie', 'huidige_provincie',
'arrondissement', 'huidig_arrondissement', 'niscode', 'huidige_niscode',)

# Displaying the Markt markt_dimension
display(markt_dimension)
display(date_dimension)
display(geo_location_dimension)

# Writing the markt dimension to delta file
file_path = 'abfss://goldlayer@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/PySparkDimensions/Markt_Dimension'
write_format="delta"
#partition_by=["DM_Peildatum"]
mode_ = "overwrite" #append

markt_dimension\
.write\
.option("header", "true")\
.option("overwriteSchema", "true")\
.format(write_format)\
.mode(mode_)\
.save(file_path)

#.partitionBy(partition_by)\

# Writing the date dimension to delta file
file_path = 'abfss://goldlayer@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/PySparkDimensions/Date_Dimension'
write_format="delta"
#partition_by=["DM_Peildatum"]
mode_ = "overwrite" #append

date_dimension\
.write\
.option("header", "true")\
.option("overwriteSchema", "true")\
.format(write_format)\
.mode(mode_)\
.save(file_path)

#.partitionBy(partition_by)\

# Writing the geo location dimension to delta file
file_path = 'abfss://goldlayer@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/PySparkDimensions/Geo_Location_Dimension'
write_format="delta"
#partition_by=["DM_Peildatum"]
mode_ = "overwrite" #append

geo_location_dimension\
.write\
.option("header", "true")\
.option("overwriteSchema", "true")\
.format(write_format)\
.mode(mode_)\
.save(file_path)

#.partitionBy(partition_by)\
